Contact Your Elected Officials
==============================

Federal Elected Officials:
--------------------------

* **Donald J. Trump (R)**  
  47th President of the United States  
  (202) 456-1111  
  [Homepage](https://www.whitehouse.gov/)
* **JD Vance (R)**  
  Vice President of the United States  
  (202) 456-1111  
  [Homepage](https://www.whitehouse.gov/administration/jd-vance/)
* **John Cornyn (R)**  
  U.S. Senator  
  (202) 224-2934  
  [Homepage](https://www.cornyn.senate.gov/)
* **Ted Cruz (R)**  
  U.S. Senator  
  (202) 224-5922  
  [Homepage](https://www.cruz.senate.gov/) | [Email](https://www.cruz.senate.gov/contact/write-ted)
* **August Pfluger (R)**  
  U.S. Representative  
  (202) 225-3605  
  [Homepage](https://pfluger.house.gov/) | [Email](https://pfluger.house.gov/contact)

State Elected Officials:
------------------------

* **Greg Abbott (R)**  
  Governor of Texas  
  (512) 463-2000  
  [Homepage](https://gov.texas.gov/) | [Email](https://gov.texas.gov/contact)
* **Dan Patrick (R)**  
  Lieutenant Governor of Texas  
  (512) 463-0001  
  [Homepage](https://www.ltgov.texas.gov/)
* **Phil King (R)**TX State Senator  
  District 10  
  (512) 463-0110  
  [Homepage](https://senate.texas.gov/member.php?d=24) | [Email](https://senate.texas.gov/memberform.php?auth=elwR80NC%2BXAX%2F%2FEJWLdvc4axixqSr5z7TS3t1a2QGnc6XzpfOixCpBfOxT7SJ8W88IRkNHqUM159eaIoPq%2FeEVu4H%2B%2FjNHM6Onw6fDrz2XaRZCIRdNc6ehb5Iygi&lang=en)
* **David Spiller (R)**TX State Representative  
  District 68  
  (512) 463-0526  
  [Homepage](https://house.texas.gov/members/member-page/?district=68) | [Email](https://house.texas.gov/members/member-page/email/?district=68&session=88)
